SELECT sys_table.TABLE_SCHEMA as tableSchema, sys_table.TABLE_NAME as tableName, sys_table.`ENGINE` as `engine`, sys_table.TABLE_ROWS as tableRows, sys_table.AVG_ROW_LENGTH as avgRowLength, sys_table.DATA_LENGTH as dataLength, sys_table.MAX_DATA_LENGTH as maxDataLength, sys_table.INDEX_LENGTH as indexLength, sys_table.DATA_FREE as dataFree, sys_table.AUTO_INCREMENT as autoIncrement, sys_table.CREATE_TIME as createTime, sys_table.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, sys_table.TABLE_COMMENT as tableComment FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES sys_table
and sys_table.TABLE_SCHEMA = #{dto.tableSchema, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
